title: Silver Extends Decline After Selloff Wipes Out This Year’s Gains
description: Silver fell, after plunging 20% in the previous session, as the white metal struggled to find a floor following a historic market rout. Gold was little changed.
content: Silver fell, after plunging 20% in the previous session, as the white metal struggled to find a floor following a historic market rout. Gold was little changed.
